channel.title: Malcolm HICKS on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Malcolm HICKS on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Notification to McDonald’s executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: 发件人: 为了保护涉及此案的受害者/关键证人/举报人，我会手动隐去姓名］（上述备注实属不得已，如果您想了解其中隐情或我的更多故事，您可以访问 X-v-France.com） SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com, Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com I forgot to mention… As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against “X” (but targeting McDonald’s) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites. One such comment was saying that my website was the fraud. Amazing and shameful from your employees!

item.title: 请停止欺诈行为！

item.title: Malcolm Hicks是麦当劳欧洲分部副总裁兼法律顾问
item.description: On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe. 发件人：Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com 主题：对法国大富翁游戏的质询 接收时间
